message: I'm taking the lion's share this time, but if you reject this, I'll be taking even more in the next round.  Think about it.
You're trying to take the lion's share, but I'm not that easy to scare. I'll give you a decent offer, but don't expect it to get better if you reject this.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still believe I deserve the majority.  Let's work together to find a fair solution, or we'll both end up with nothing.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a fair solution. I'll give you a bit more, but don't think this is a sign of weakness.
I'm getting tired of this game.  Let's settle on something reasonable before we both lose everything.  This is my final offer.  Accept it, or we'll both walk away empty-handed.
You're trying to bluff, but I'm not buying it. This is my last serious offer. If you reject it, I'll make sure you regret it.
